ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the bank accounts are pretty safe becuase I have also played on several systems and mine remains the same so the info can t be stored locally. Your
ygData.messageBody:
I think the bank accounts are pretty safe becuase I
have also played on several systems and mine remains
the same so the info can't be stored locally. Your
character's inventory and skills and everything else
is also stored on verant servers. Not to mention
there is a log that they keep on your
character...thats how they did away with people's
money that used the pottery exploit to make money.
One day a character had 100 plat... the next the log
showed he had 8,000 plat and that characters bank
account was reduced by a bunch by Verant. The reason
that you see people walking around with exotic stuff
at low levels is because:
A) they got friends that are high level that give
them stuff

or B) You can transfer items from one of your higher
level characters to your lower level one.
-Kenny





---rick nunez <ricknunez@...> wrote:
>
> From: "rick nunez" <ricknunez@...>
>
> Well I feel if someone can have access to there
bank account in the game now
> that would be a bunch of *hit.
> I mean come on for some pimple faced moron to sit
down and try to figure
> it out.
> I mean only a moron whould even try to do
anything like this.
>
>
> Anyways I hope I did not offend anyone, but this is
how I feel about
> hackers.
>
> Lancoche(karana)
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Kenneth Harrison <kharriso@...>
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Sent: Saturday, August 28, 1999 10:23 AM
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?
>
>
> > From: Kenneth Harrison <kharriso@...>
> >
> > not true. I play from 2 different systems and my
bank and money stays the
> same.
> >
> > Bantis

available i will quit EQ.
> I

(the last peice i need for
> > full banded i think) and i see a lvl 1 ranger
walk past me with Full
> Thorny
> > Vine Armor, A Darkwood Bow, Fish Bone Earings,
and A Pegasus Cloak. (those
> > are the items on my wishlist). I would probably
chalange him to a dual but

> >
> > Trevalien
> >

able to unpack any files to
> > >verify/refute this? If this is found to be true,
then it looks as though

> > >has been hacked like UO.
